Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E9 The Trials of Temple Houston Temple Houston, flamboyant son of Sam Houston, works hard to live up to his famous name as a top attorney in the Oklahoma Territory. But his flair for showmanship annoys his courtroom rivals, the Jennings brothers, and the feud erupts into bloodshed.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E12 Annie Oakley & Buffalo Bill's Wild West Showdown When Buffalo Bill adds female sharpshooter Lillian Smith to his Wild West show, it jeopardizes his relationship with the show's current star, Annie Oakley. As the rivalry between Annie and Lillian escalates, the future of the show is put at risk.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E3 Jim Baker: A Born Leader Heading west as a young adventurer, greenhorn Jim Baker quickly develops a reputation as a skilled marksman and mountain man. When a party of trappers is surrounded and attacked by Cheyenne and Arapaho warriors, Baker proves that he is also a leader.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E8 A Bull’s Market It's now down to the top five cowboys. In the last immunity challenge of the season, Trace tests the competitors' cattle IQ with a trivia challenge — the cowboy way. For every true or false question, the cowboys must rope a steer wearing a sign with the correct answer to earn a point, and the cowboy with the most points wins. One cowboy's strategy to hang back and let the other contestants take themselves out backfires. In the elimination challenge, Trace gets rid of the teams! It may be every cowboy for themself, but they still have to work together to separate two bulls from a herd of cattle. The cowboys debate over how to get the job done, but they eventually reach an agreement. When their plan quickly goes south and puts them all in danger, two cowboys lock horns, and the arena heats up during elimination. The judges make a major revelation about the challenge, and the cowboy with a bossy attitude gets the boot.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E13 Spies The Kid befriends a young woman named Margaret, who unbeknownst to him, is a charming spy. His kindness toward her results in him and the other riders becoming involved in an elaborate scheme to steal a gold shipment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E17 Long Trek While escorting a killer named Stanley to North Fork to stand trial, Lucas and Marshal Micah Torrance endure harsh conditions crossing the desert. Micah is injured and their horses are lost. The prisoner taunts them but Lucas' endurance prevails.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E18 The Actress A dying friend of Lucas McCain's asks him to go to a nearby town to bring back his wife, Elizabeth, so he can see her one last time. Lucas agrees but is surprised to find a beautiful, young actress who is not interested in grieving over her husband.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E19 Face of Yesterday Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when he comes face-to-face with Simon Lee, a young man who looks exactly like a Confederate officer he killed during the Civil War. Simon Lee is fast with a gun, and provokes Lucas into a life and death situation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E22 Closer Than a Brother Marshal Micah Torrance loses his confidence in his job of authority and begins drinking again after an old enemy from the past terrorizes him. When Lucas learns of the situation, he invites the man to North Fork and convinces Micah to face his fears.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Argonauts Cheyenne tries to help two prospectors locate a gold mine after Indians kill their partner, who knew the mine's location. Cheyenne finds the gold, but greed and distrust take over the prospectors, causing major issues.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E4 Border Showdown Cheyenne and Smitty travel to Mexico to bring a gang of outlaws accused of killing Cheyenne's close friend to justice. However, after they arrive, they discover that the small Mexican town is under the rule of the gang's leader.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S4 E2 New Sheriff in Town It’s back to basics on The Cowboy Way as the guys work to rotate cattle off a lightning-struck field to fresh grass, but the routine wrangle suddenly heads south as the herd scatters, jumping and taking down part of a fence. Kaley wonders about finances and if she should find work, while Bubba invests in a starter herd for daughter Andie’s Cowgirl College Fund. Jaclyn rushes to prepare for Matthew’s 4th birthday party and anxiously waits for news after a job interview. Booger’s parents have a special birthday surprise for Matthew. As the Cattlemen’s Association Ambassador, Cody gets a call from a local farmer and meets their autistic son Tristan. Misty gives Cody an idea how to share the cowboy way lifestyle with this special boy.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: These guys can wrangle any bull, but can they tame a wild bulldozer? In this episode of The Cowboy Way, the guys decide to build a new barn for a local rancher but it’s man versus machine when Bubba’s dozer breaks a pipeline, releasing a torrent of water. Jaclyn admits to her boss she’s been looking for a job closer to home, then worries it might get her fired altogether. Will her family have to survive on one income? Cody decides to write a book about the cowboy way of life, but he may have bitten off more than he can chew. The cowboys struggle to get the barn raised in time to process the first shipment of the herd and might have to call in some favors to do it.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E29 The Score Is Even Lucas and Mark go on a hunting trip and soon become witnesses to a robbery and murder. Lucas subdues the two robbers, but is severely wounded in the process. Lucas struggles to get the robbers to justice, but devises a plan just in the nick of time.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E30 The Mescalero Curse Lucas serves as a jury foreman when a Mescalero Apache Indian is found guilty of murder and is hanged. A Mescalero medicine man places a curse on Lucas. At first Lucas brushes it off, then unusual events begin to happen including a ghost stallion.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E1 They Killed Me Frontiersman Jim Bridger spins an incredible tale to a group of settlers, claiming he was once killed by Blackfeet warriors yet somehow lived to tell the tale. They think he's joking, but Bridger soon proves that he really did rise from the dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E4 Brothers in Arms When they are ambushed by a Blackfeet war party, Jim Bridger and a lone Shoshone brave must work together to find a way to defeat their common enemy. If they can't overcome their suspicions and learn to trust each other, they may not survive the day.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E9 The Trials of Temple Houston Temple Houston, flamboyant son of Sam Houston, works hard to live up to his famous name as a top attorney in the Oklahoma Territory. But his flair for showmanship annoys his courtroom rivals, the Jennings brothers, and the feud erupts into bloodshed.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E12 Annie Oakley & Buffalo Bill's Wild West Showdown When Buffalo Bill adds female sharpshooter Lillian Smith to his Wild West show, it jeopardizes his relationship with the show's current star, Annie Oakley. As the rivalry between Annie and Lillian escalates, the future of the show is put at risk.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E3 Jim Baker: A Born Leader Heading west as a young adventurer, greenhorn Jim Baker quickly develops a reputation as a skilled marksman and mountain man. When a party of trappers is surrounded and attacked by Cheyenne and Arapaho warriors, Baker proves that he is also a leader.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E8 A Bull’s Market It's now down to the top five cowboys. In the last immunity challenge of the season, Trace tests the competitors' cattle IQ with a trivia challenge — the cowboy way. For every true or false question, the cowboys must rope a steer wearing a sign with the correct answer to earn a point, and the cowboy with the most points wins. One cowboy's strategy to hang back and let the other contestants take themselves out backfires. In the elimination challenge, Trace gets rid of the teams! It may be every cowboy for themself, but they still have to work together to separate two bulls from a herd of cattle. The cowboys debate over how to get the job done, but they eventually reach an agreement. When their plan quickly goes south and puts them all in danger, two cowboys lock horns, and the arena heats up during elimination. The judges make a major revelation about the challenge, and the cowboy with a bossy attitude gets the boot.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E13 Spies The Kid befriends a young woman named Margaret, who unbeknownst to him, is a charming spy. His kindness toward her results in him and the other riders becoming involved in an elaborate scheme to steal a gold shipment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E17 Long Trek While escorting a killer named Stanley to North Fork to stand trial, Lucas and Marshal Micah Torrance endure harsh conditions crossing the desert. Micah is injured and their horses are lost. The prisoner taunts them but Lucas' endurance prevails.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E18 The Actress A dying friend of Lucas McCain's asks him to go to a nearby town to bring back his wife, Elizabeth, so he can see her one last time. Lucas agrees but is surprised to find a beautiful, young actress who is not interested in grieving over her husband.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E19 Face of Yesterday Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when he comes face-to-face with Simon Lee, a young man who looks exactly like a Confederate officer he killed during the Civil War. Simon Lee is fast with a gun, and provokes Lucas into a life and death situation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E22 Closer Than a Brother Marshal Micah Torrance loses his confidence in his job of authority and begins drinking again after an old enemy from the past terrorizes him. When Lucas learns of the situation, he invites the man to North Fork and convinces Micah to face his fears.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Argonauts Cheyenne tries to help two prospectors locate a gold mine after Indians kill their partner, who knew the mine's location. Cheyenne finds the gold, but greed and distrust take over the prospectors, causing major issues.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E4 Border Showdown Cheyenne and Smitty travel to Mexico to bring a gang of outlaws accused of killing Cheyenne's close friend to justice. However, after they arrive, they discover that the small Mexican town is under the rule of the gang's leader.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S4 E4 Keep on Chuckin' It’s The Cowboy Way’s first road trip ever! Bubba, Cody and Booger cut loose and head north to enter a big chuck wagon race. But they quickly discover this race is not for amateurs. Loose wagon wheels, knee-deep mud and professional-grade competition raise both the stakes, and their concerns. Will the guys risk life and limb to race and win? And while the cowboys are away, a surprise shipment of cattle comes in days early and their wives must jump into action. But this drop off is anything but routine when Kaley and Misty discover one heifer has an infection that could threaten the entire herd.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: Booger goes back to school! On this episode of The Cowboy Way, the cowboys visit the Montgomery Stockyard to research cattle prices and Booger gets bitten by the auctioneering bug. Will his auctioneering classes pay off? Back at the ranch, the guys catch heat from a neighbor when their herd escapes into his field, and a rebellious heifer takes them on one heck of a ride. Misty’s brother-in-law, Chip, stops by and gives Cody an earful that his feeding pasture has turned to dirt. And when the cattle stock market takes a nosedive, the cowboys’ million-dollar business partner calls the gang into his office for a tough talk.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E31 Stopover A brutal snowstorm makes the roads impassable and forces a stagecoach to stop at the McCain Ranch. Lucas gives the passengers shelter, but little does he know a dance hall girl, a drunk, and a famous gunslinger are his guests.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E32 The Lonesome Bride Brothers Charv and Kelly Banner play a joke on Lucas that soon gets out of hand when they contact a St. Louis marriage bureau to send a possible bride for Lucas. Mary Woodson arrives in North Fork ready for marriage, but Lucas wants no part of it.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Fossil Feud When bloodthirsty Canadian trappers try to kill him, mountain man Jim Bridger takes cover in an unexplored valley. There, he runs headlong into a family of escaped slaves who show him the huge footprints and fossilized bones of long-dead monsters.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E1 Bat Masterson Leaves the West After leaving Dodge City, Bat Masterson takes a job as manager of Denver's Palace Theatre. There he falls in love with Emma Walter, a jugging virtuoso known as the Queen of Clubs, and begins to question his life as a gunslinger.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E6 Black Bart's Revenge Wells Fargo detective James Hume hires private investigator Harry Morse to join the hunt for Black Bart. Known as the Poet Highwayman, Bart leaves tantalizing poems at the scenes of his crimes, which may be the key to unmasking Bart's true identity.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E4 Lucien Maxwell: Legend of New Mexico Having explored the frontier with his good friend Kit Carson, Lucien Maxwell is eager to settle down with his family. But before he can establish a ranching empire in New Mexico, Maxwell must first survive a deadly clash with the Jicarilla Apache.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E9 Every Cowboy for Themselves The competition takes a new turn now that it’s down to the top four cowboys. This time around, there’s no immunity challenge, and teams are a thing of the past. Every cowboy stands on their own, and one wrong move could cost them the competition. The cowboys have two shots at making it to the final three with a two-part elimination challenge. In Part One, the first cowboy to rope, drive and load two steers and their horse in a trailer wins. Two cowboys are neck and neck the entire round, but only one comes up on top. Part two’s obstacle course tests the contestants’ control and handling of the unruly colts they’ve been training since early on in the competition. But just when the finish line is in view, Trace throws a curveball into the competition that catches the cowboys off guard. While some thrive under the pressure, ultimately, the cowboy that can’t adapt in the moment goes home.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E14 Shadowmen A Pinkerton agent comes to Rock Creek in search of a bank robber. Meanwhile, Teaspoon befriends Marie, who claims to be destitute, but Bill and Jesse discover that she is part of an outlaw gang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E20 The Wyoming Story Part 1 After Lucas' herd is wiped out by disease, he takes a job as an undercover agent for the U.S. government to raise money for new cattle. He travels to Wyoming to learn how renegade Cheyenne Indians are getting rifles illegally.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E21 The Wyoming Story Part 2 Lucas continues his investigation in Wyoming and makes contact with the local Indian agent, the source of the illegal gun-running operation. However, Lucas' life is put in danger when the town drunk reveals his true identity.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E23 The Lost Treasure of Canyon Town On the way home to North Fork, Lucas, Micah, and Mark take a detour to Micah's hometown. A thriving mining town years ago, it is now a ghost town except for Mr. Newman and his son who still live there. Something is amiss, and a mystery is revealed.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E24 Dark Day at North Fork While hauling dynamite, Lucas accidentally creates a spark, leading to an explosion. He is blinded and Doc Burrage isn't sure if he will regain his sight. When an enemy from Lucas' past shows up in town, he is in danger, as the man aims to kill him.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Outlander Cheyenne's travels take him to a small town called Paradise Springs. Instead of a warm welcome, angry townspeople confront him and quickly run him out of town. However, perplexed by his cruel treatment, he returns to uncover the reason behind it.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E6 The Travelers The murder of a US Marshal forces Cheyenne to bring back the outlaw wanted for the crime. However, Cheyenne doesn't believe the man is guilty. On his way back with the fugitive, the father of the victim is hot on his trail.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S4 E4 Keep on Chuckin' It’s The Cowboy Way’s first road trip ever! Bubba, Cody and Booger cut loose and head north to enter a big chuck wagon race. But they quickly discover this race is not for amateurs. Loose wagon wheels, knee-deep mud and professional-grade competition raise both the stakes, and their concerns. programme.desc: S3 E21 The Wyoming Story Part 2 Lucas continues his investigation in Wyoming and makes contact with the local Indian agent, the source of the illegal gun-running operation. However, Lucas' life is put in danger when the town drunk reveals his true identity.

programme.desc: S1 E5 The Outlander Cheyenne's travels take him to a small town called Paradise Springs. Instead of a warm welcome, angry townspeople confront him and quickly run him out of town. However, perplexed by his cruel treatment, he returns to uncover the reason behind it.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E6 The Travelers The murder of a US Marshal forces Cheyenne to bring back the outlaw wanted for the crime. However, Cheyenne doesn't believe the man is guilty. On his way back with the fugitive, the father of the victim is hot on his trail.

programme.title: Romance in the Wilds
programme.desc: Deep in the Rocky Mountains, lightning strikes a mining site, sparking a deadly wildfire and igniting an unexpected romance between a forest ranger and a geologist as they race to escape the flames.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E33 Death Trap Lucas and Mark find a wounded man and bring him into North Fork to save his life. Lucas asks Simon Battle, a gunfighter-turned-doctor, to help the man. The wounded man's enemies have other plans in store.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E34 The Queue A Chinese man named Wang Chi and his son, Wang Lee, come to North Fork to open a laundry service in town. Vince Fergus, a prejudiced man, bullies them but Micah, Lucas, and Milly try to convince them to stay. A fight between Fergus and Lucas ensues.

programme.title: Freedom on the Range
programme.desc: S1 E1 From brave lawmen to rugged cowboys, discover the untold stories of African Americans' cultural significance in the Old West.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E7 Elijah Briant and the Wild Bunch When Elijah Briant is elected sheriff, the mild-mannered druggist and former teacher tries to enforce the law without carrying a weapon. But he soon faces his greatest challenge when the last surviving members of the Wild Bunch descend on his town.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E8 El Bandito Vasquez When an elusive bandito terrorizes early Los Angeles County, an eager reporter shadows the sheriff who is hunting the dangerous outlaw. Will the reporter stay objective or take matters into his own hands when he comes face to face with the killer?

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E5 Bill Hamilton: The Last Mountain Man Coming of age on the frontier, young Bill Hamilton joins Old Bill Williams on an epic adventure during the final days of the fur trade. The last true mountain man, Hamilton's courage is tested when he faces an epic showdown with Bannock warriors.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E10 Last Hand Standing In the season finale of Ultimate Cowboy Showdown, the top three competitors cowboy up for a chance to win it all. In the last elimination challenge, the cowboys must work as a team to separate the prized cattle from two hundred other cows and drive the herd to a semi-truck, where they will load them up for the winner to take home. A big job for three cowboys, frustrations get the best of them. One contestant covers the rougher country to stand out to the judges. Another cowboy suggests breaking the rules to finish the job, but their teammate steps up and takes the lead to get the job done right. Trace sits down with each cowboy to talk about what winning would mean to them before announcing the Ultimate Cowboy Showdown winner.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E15 Mask of Fear After serving his time in prison, a murderer returns to Rock Creek. Meanwhile, Jesse has a new boss in Fury, who he looks up to as a father figure. But, the murder of his boss leads Jesse and the townspeople quick to blame the town's new arrival.

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman
programme.desc: When a gunslinger with a bad disposition is nursed back to health and desired by a Quaker girl, he finds himself having to choose between his lawless life or the peaceful world of his newfound love.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E18 Sporting Chance Englishman Jeremy Pennebroke arrives in North Fork and announces he has come to kill Lucas McCain with his custom-made rifle. He believes if he guns Lucas down, he will earn respect and a reputation. Ironically, Lucas later defends Pennebroke.

programme.title: Romance in the Wilds
programme.desc: Deep in the Rocky Mountains, lightning strikes a mining site, sparking a deadly wildfire and igniting an unexpected romance between a forest ranger and a geologist as they race to escape the flames.

programme.desc: S3 E15 Mask of Fear After serving his time in prison, a murderer returns to Rock Creek. Meanwhile, Jesse has a new boss in Fury, who he looks up to as a father figure. But, the murder of his boss leads Jesse and the townspeople quick to blame the town's new arrival.

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman
programme.desc: When a gunslinger with a bad disposition is nursed back to health and desired by a Quaker girl, he finds himself having to choose between his lawless life or the peaceful world of his newfound love.

programme.title: The Warrant: Breaker's Law
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal John Breaker and his deputy ride to a town held hostage by a ruthless gang as they transport a prisoner through the West. With the fate of a community at stake, they must decide if they will abandon the town or make a stand for justice.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E9 The Long Goodbye Stubborn Grandpa Fogerty lives in a rundown house with his grandson, Woody. Lucas tries to get the old man to send the boy to school. The ladies of North Fork want Woody removed from the home and ask Lucas to help them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E10 The Shattered Idol Famous writer Mark Twain visits North Fork and Mark, who idolizes him, is hurt by his rudeness. Lucas intervenes and discovers the source of Twain's bitterness comes from personal tragedy. Later, both Marks become friends.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E11 Long Gun from Tucson A killer, John Holliver, and his followers come to North Fork looking for revenge. All of the residents are terrified since they ran him out of town five years earlier. Lucas, now acting marshal, realizes that he must face Holliver and his men alone.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E12 The High Country Two mountain men, Ambrose and Gorwin, come to the McCain Ranch. Ambrose is captivated by Lucas' rifle but Lucas won't trade it. After Gorwin is killed trying to steal it, the family holds Lucas accountable.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E5 James Harrod: Kentucky's Founding Father When frontiersman James Harrod founds Harrod's Town on Native American hunting grounds in Kentucky, he soon finds his new settlement under attack. His leadership is tested as he defends the first European settlement west of the Appalachian Mountains.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E14 Annie Oakley: Rise of a Shooting Star After her father’s death, nine-year-old Annie Oakley first picks up a rifle and begins shooting small game in order to feed her siblings and support her widowed mother. By her teenage years, Annie is so good at hunting that she begins supplying meat to a local grocery store, earning enough money to pay off her mother’s mortgage. When famed sharpshooter Frank Butler comes to town for an exhibition, Annie accepts his challenge to participate in a shooting match. Not only does she win the match, but she wins Butler’s heart as well. They are soon married, but they struggle to make it as a team on stage. A better shooter, Annie must become the main attraction for them to succeed. Years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson, tracks down Annie’s husband to learn more about the rise of this shooting star.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E15 Charles M. Russell: The Cowboy Artist Charlie Russell is an aimless cowhand who loves the freedom of the cowboy way of life, and he is a self-taught artist who enjoys capturing the scenes of his rugged work on the range. Too embarrassed to ask people to pay for his paintings, he gives most of them away to friends or trades them for drinks at the saloon. But that changes quickly after he falls in love. Charlie’s new bride Nancy gives him the encouragement he needs to stop cowboying in order to focus on his artwork. Under her watchful eye, he sobers up, stops cowboying, and improves his mastery of painting. Nancy is so proud of Charlie’s talent that she doesn’t hesitate to ask top dollar for his paintings. Years later, when legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson tries to do a piece on Charlie, he quickly realizes that he must first deal with the woman behind the famous cowboy artist Charles M. Russell.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S5 E4 Two Trails to Santa Fe Cheyenne helps an Apache woman escape torture from her tribe. He transports her to Santa Fe. However, angry Apaches retaliate and attack a settlement. The pair also encounters gold-hungry prospectors along the way.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E9 The Spiked Rifle Lucas agrees to ride shotgun on a stagecoach carrying $20,000 in gold for North Fork banker John Hamilton after a man fails to show up. When three men rob the stage and take Mark hostage, Lucas must get both the gold and Mark back safely.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E10 Letter of the Law Marshal Micah Torrance arrests infamous outlaw Brett Stocker and deputizes Lucas McCain into duty so he can transport the outlaw to another town. When Stocker's gang ambush Torrance and send a letter to Lucas with demands, Lucas must act quickly.

programme.title: The Last Days of Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: When the famous James brothers give up robbing banks and attempt to live as reputable gentleman farmers, they are soon forced to seek revenge on the men who bomb their mother's house, crippling her, and killing their stepbrother.

programme.title: Concrete Cowboys
programme.desc: When two lively cowboys from Montana are set up by a crooked sheriff, they wind up on the run. After arriving in Nashville, the two open a detective agency together and are soon hired to prevent the kidnapping of a country singer.

programme.title: The Warrant: Breaker's Law
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal John Breaker and his deputy ride to a town held hostage by a ruthless gang as they transport a prisoner through the West. With the fate of a community at stake, they must decide if they will abandon the town or make a stand for justice.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E9 The Long Goodbye Stubborn Grandpa Fogerty lives in a rundown house with his grandson, Woody. Lucas tries to get the old man to send the boy to school. The ladies of North Fork want Woody removed from the home and ask Lucas to help them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E10 The Shattered Idol Famous writer Mark Twain visits North Fork and Mark, who idolizes him, is hurt by his rudeness. Lucas intervenes and discovers the source of Twain's bitterness comes from personal tragedy. Later, both Marks become friends.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E11 Long Gun from Tucson A killer, John Holliver, and his followers come to North Fork looking for revenge. All of the residents are terrified since they ran him out of town five years earlier. Lucas, now acting marshal, realizes that he must face Holliver and his men alone.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E12 The High Country Two mountain men, Ambrose and Gorwin, come to the McCain Ranch. Ambrose is captivated by Lucas' rifle but Lucas won't trade it. After Gorwin is killed trying to steal it, the family holds Lucas accountable.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E5 James Harrod: Kentucky's Founding Father When frontiersman James Harrod founds Harrod's Town on Native American hunting grounds in Kentucky, he soon finds his new settlement under attack. His leadership is tested as he defends the first European settlement west of the Appalachian Mountains.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E14 Annie Oakley: Rise of a Shooting Star After her father’s death, nine-year-old Annie Oakley first picks up a rifle and begins shooting small game in order to feed her siblings and support her widowed mother. Russell.

programme.title: Cheyenne

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E9 The Spiked Rifle Lucas agrees to ride shotgun on a stagecoach carrying $20,000 in gold for North Fork banker John Hamilton after a man fails to show up. When three men rob the stage and take Mark hostage, Lucas must get both the gold and Mark back safely.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E10 Letter of the Law Marshal Micah Torrance arrests infamous outlaw Brett Stocker and deputizes Lucas McCain into duty so he can transport the outlaw to another town. When Stocker's gang ambush Torrance and send a letter to Lucas with demands, Lucas must act quickly.

programme.title: The Last Days of Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: When the famous James brothers give up robbing banks and attempt to live as reputable gentleman farmers, they are soon forced to seek revenge on the men who bomb their mother's house, crippling her, and killing their stepbrother.

programme.title: Concrete Cowboys
programme.desc: When two lively cowboys from Montana are set up by a crooked sheriff, they wind up on the run. After arriving in Nashville, the two open a detective agency together and are soon hired to prevent the kidnapping of a country singer.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: It's the late 1800s and a marshal must stop a volatile and growing conflict between homesteaders and cattle drivers in his small town on the Kansas frontier.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S2 E20 Face of the Enemy Teaspoon's old friend, war hero Colonel Matthew Curtis, orders an attack on the Sioux delegation after they ambush his men. The townspeople are in danger when the Sioux threatens to retaliate. It turns out that another tribe is responsible.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E7 The Assailants When Senator Jim Borden visits North Fork, Marshal Micah Torrance receives a telegram stating an assassination attempt could be made on the senator's life. The plot begins to unfold as four gunman disguised as cavalrymen arrive with a Gatling gun.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E8 Mark's Rifle Marty Blair rides into North Fork to promote a circus coming out west from Ohio. Blair is soon under suspicion when there is an attempted robbery at the hotel. Mark finds it hard to believe that Blair is guilty, however, Lucas feels differently.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E7 Wild Bill Hickok & the First Quick-Draw Duel Wild Bill Hickok and his buddy, Davis Tutt, see their friendship fall apart over gambling debts and the affections of a beautiful woman. After Tutt swipes Wild Bill’s prized timepiece as payback for a disputed debt, things begin to heat up. Then, when Tutt parades through town with the watch in one hand and Hickok’s former girlfriend in the other, Wild Bill’s blood begins to boil. Tutt refuses to return the watch, and he continues to flaunt the beautiful woman on his arm. The two men meet in the middle of town to settle their differences once and for all in what will become the very first quick-draw duel of the Old West. Both men reach for their pistols at the same time and fire! In an attempt to separate the truth from the fiction, Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, interviews George Ward Nichols, the journalist who immortalized the duel and created the legend of Wild Bill Hickok.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E8 Dr. Susan Anderson: Frontier Medicine Woman Freshly-graduated from medical school, Dr. Susan Anderson sets up a practice in Cripple Creek, Colorado, a rough-and-tumble mining town. At a time when only ten percent of physicians are female, Dr. Anderson faces her share of doubters and has a difficult time attracting patients in the frontier town. When miners suddenly rush into her office with an injured boy, she defies prevailing wisdom and decides to save his mangled arm instead of amputating the limb. The risks are enormous. If the boy’s arm becomes infected, and he dies, she will lose everything. Years later, Dr. Anderson relives the story while treating Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman, who comes down with fever while passing through Cripple Creek.

programme.title: Buffalo Keepers
programme.desc: S1 E1 Today, the buffalo is the quintessential symbol of strength, freedom, and the unspoiled American West. But in the late 1800s, the nation's buffalo were nearly wiped out by ruthless hide hunters. Those majestic herds, which once numbered in the tens of millions, were down to less than 500 animals. This is the story of the handful of determined men and women who mobilized to save the ones that were left in a last-ditch effort to stave off extinction. Ranchers like Charles and Mary Ann Goodnight rescued orphaned buffalo calves and built small herds. Former buffalo hunters like Buffalo Bill helped build public sympathy. And politicians like Theodore Roosevelt helped pass laws to protect the remaining animals. The effort would be a generational one, with buffalo herds carefully tended, bred, and passed down to new stewards when their old protectors passed away. Thanks to their efforts, there are an estimated 500,000 buffalo thundering across America's grasslands once again.

programme.title: Legal Action
programme.desc: Big-city lawyer Casey McKay, (Eric Close - Nashville, Without a Trace) a winner with a long hot streak, didn't expect the mysterious text from his ex-wife, Pru, (Tanya Clarke - A Beautiful Mind, Guiding Light) about her brother, Jay. No stranger to being on the wrong side of the law, Jay is accused of murdering a District Attorney. Casey takes the case, but soon discovers this will be no ordinary legal defense. Teaming up with eccentric ex-marine turned motel owner and P.I. "Ex" Clemens, (Nick Searcy - Justified, The Shape of Water) he discovers a web of conspiracy that puts him face-to-face with the town's most greedy and corrupt land developer, Mr. Gates (Tommy Flanagan - Sons of Anarchy, Braveheart). As Casey begins to unravel the truth, he finds himself fighting for his former brother-in-law's life, as well as his own.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: When a dispute over grazing rights to a fertile canyon leads to cattle rustling, the rustling ignites a range war, turning two brothers against one another. Will both brothers survive the deadly conflict between them?

programme.title: Gunslinger
programme.desc: When a town marshal is gunned down, his wife bravely returns fire at the gunmen and kills one. The widow is named the town's temporary marshal. At her husband's funeral, she spies the second killer and plans to finish avenging her husband.

programme.title: Abilene Town

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: "The 700 Club," which first broadcast in 1966, is a newsmagazine featuring guests, news, music, testimonies and spiritual stories from a Christian perspective. News stories are frequently related to Bible passages or deal with Christian lifestyle issues. Hosts of the long-running religious show include televangelist (and former candidate for the Republican presidential nomination) Pat Robertson, Terry Meeuwsen and Gordon Robertson, son of Pat. News items of interest are delivered by anchor John Jessup.

programme.desc: John Bachman focuses on the biggest news from D.C., N.Y., and around America!

programme.title: Rob Schmitt This Week
programme.desc: Rob Schmitt wraps up all the latest news and opinion and sets the stage for tomorrow.

programme.title: Newsmax News In-Depth
programme.desc: Bianca de la Garza looks at the big stories of the week, politics, policy, the economy, and much more!

programme.title: The Freedom File: Judge Napolitano
programme.desc: Judge Napolitano provides commentary on current events, drawing on his expertise in constitutional law to protect individual freedoms in his legal and political news coverage.

programme.title: Carl Higbie This Week
programme.desc: Carl Higbie gives common-sense news analysis, exposes big government and media bias, as he fights for American values.

programme.title: The Record With Greta Van Susteren Weekly
programme.desc: Greta Van Susteren gives the big news from D.C., N.Y., across America, and around the world.

programme.title: Wise Guys With John Tabacco
programme.desc: John Tabacco and his crew look at the big issues, shining a light on hypocrisy and dangerous policies of the elites.

programme.title: Michael Savage: Savage Nation
programme.desc: Michael Savage delivers his insights on politics, culture, faith and more as he seeks to save Western Civilization!

programme.title: The Freedom File: Judge Napolitano
programme.desc: Judge Napolitano provides commentary on current events, drawing on his expertise in constitutional law to protect individual freedoms in his legal and political news coverage.

programme.title: David Harris Jr. The Pulse Weekly
programme.desc: David Harris Jr. delivers hard-hitting analysis and opinion of the latest news and events.

programme.title: Upheaval: The Journey of Menachem Begin
programme.desc: The life of Israeli Prime Minister Menachem Begin, a proud and scarred leader haunted by the Holocaust and war who was able to make peace with his greatest enemy.

programme.title: Jerusalem: From Truman to Trump
programme.desc: Since 1948 each U.S. president has played a role in Israel's foundation & establishment of Jerusalem as its capital city. This program examines the strategic & geographic importance of the Holy Land & the huge impact it's had on every U.S. president.

programme.title: Biblical Prophecy: The End Times
programme.desc: Examines how world events are lining up with Christian and Jewish eschatology. Biblical experts explain how major events today warn of what is to come.

programme.title: Jesus in Jerusalem: His Story
programme.desc: A look at Jesus' last week on Earth. From the Mt. of Olives to the Upper Room where He had the Last Supper - where He waited for trial, possible burial, and resurrection place, and where He ascended into Heaven.

programme.title: Newsfront
programme.desc: American cities and innocent lives are being destroyed by rogue prosecutors and a well-funded, radical movement.

programme.title: A Climate Conversation
programme.desc: Cuts through the rhetoric and propaganda to ask the simple questions, grounded in science and free of political cheap shots.

programme.title: Bible Land With Sergio and Rhoda
programme.desc: Today's modern town of Cana might not be where Jesus turned water into wine, so Rhoda and Sergio set out to find the real location.

The two men, with their families, move to the recently settled Texas wilds to start over, away from the plantations of the South. But the local Indian tribes don't want them there, and start kidnapping settler women and children. Since the Indians won't talk to white men, Britt is sent to try and negotiate with them.

programme.title: Welcome to Hard Times

One of the stranger's victims, saloon dancer Molly (Janice Rule), blames pacifistic mayor Will Blue (Henry Fonda) for not stopping the rampage. Fearful the man may come back, she teaches adolescent orphan Jimmy Fee (Michael Shea) how to shoot a gun. When the stranger does return, the survivors must band together to stop him.

programme.desc: Ben Cartwright is the patriarch of an all-male Nevada ranching family. Set during and after the Civil War, "Bonanza" is the story of life on the family's thousand-acre spread, known as the Ponderosa, near Virginia City. Ben has his three sons, each with a different (and deceased) mother. Serious eldest son Adam hopes to follow in his father's footsteps; middle son Hoss is a gentle giant -- physically strong, but sometimes naive; and youngest son Little Joe is the most impetuous and romantic of the offspring.

programme.title: Fool's Parade
programme.desc: Mattie Appleyard (James Stewart) has spent the last 40 years behind bars and is finally out. A model prisoner and a hard worker, Appleyard saved up over $25,000 while in prison and entrusted the money to prison guard "Doc" Council (George Kennedy). Appleyard, along with his two ex-con friends, plans to become a respectable citizen by using the money to open a general store -- but it soon becomes clear that Doc and an unscrupulous banker have no intention of letting him go straight.

programme.title: Yuma
programme.desc: Dave Harmon (Clint Walker) is the new sheriff in Yuma, Ariz., and he has his hands full as soon as he arrives. Brothers Sam (Bruce Glover) and Rol King (Neil Russell) hold up a stagecoach, and Harmon slaps them in jail. When Rol is killed in an attempted escape, Harmon is wrongly accused of shooting him, and the Kings' big brother, Arch (Morgan Woodward), will not stand for it. Hoping to avoid another killing, Harmon vows to catch Rol's killer and put things to right.

programme.title: Stagecoach
programme.desc: John Ford's landmark Western revolves around an assorted group of colorful passengers aboard the Overland stagecoach bound for Lordsburg, New Mexico, in the 1880s. An alcoholic philosophizer (Thomas Mitchell), a lady of ill repute (Claire Trevor) and a timid liquor salesman (Donald Meek) are among the motley crew of travelers who must contend with an escaped outlaw, the Ringo Kid (John Wayne), and the ever-present threat of an Apache attack as they make their way across the Wild West.

programme.title: Black Fox
programme.desc: Ever since Alan Johnson (Christopher Reeve) freed Britt "Black Fox" Johnson (Tony Todd) from slavery, the two have considered each other not just friends but blood brothers. The two men, with their families, move to the recently settled Texas wilds to start over, away from the plantations of the South. But the local Indian tribes don't want them there, and start kidnapping settler women and children. Since the Indians won't talk to white men, Britt is sent to try and negotiate with them.

programme.title: Welcome to Hard Times
programme.desc: Wild West outpost Hard Times comes under attack by the Man From Bodie (Aldo Ray), a villain who conducts a one-man rape, murder and arson campaign that leaves few survivors. One of the stranger's victims, saloon dancer Molly (Janice Rule), blames pacifistic mayor Will Blue (Henry Fonda) for not stopping the rampage. Fearful the man may come back, she teaches adolescent orphan Jimmy Fee (Michael Shea) how to shoot a gun. When the stranger does return, the survivors must band together to stop him.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Several homesteaders are gunned down at the doors of their remote cabins by a mysterious slayer.

programme.title: Gunsmoke

programme.title: Gunsmoke

programme.title: The Fighting Seabees
programme.desc: A morale-boosting tribute to the US Navy's Construction Battalions who followed behind the troops invading Pacific islands held by the Japanese to build runways, roads and bridges. Wedge Donovan is the civilian head of a construction company approached by the Navy to train their men as specialists. Instead, the impetuous Donovan wants to prove his crew are up to the job, but they are shot up by the Japanese.

programme.title: Red River
programme.desc: After the Civil War, rancher Thomas Dunson (James Arness) leads a dangerous cattle drive across Texas with a team that includes his adopted son, Matthew (Bruce Boxleitner), and black cowboy Jack Byrd (Stan Shaw), whose presence annoys some of the white cowboys. Fearful of Indians and struggling through the dry terrain, Dunson's men grow increasingly unhappy with his authoritarian ways. Fed up, rebellious Matthew goes to work for another ranch, infuriating his father.

programme.title: The Gatling Gun
programme.desc: Fictional account of the development of the Gatling gun and the impact it had on the Western frontier.

programme.title: The Undefeated
programme.desc: Unaware that the Civil War has ended, Col. John Henry Thomas (John Wayne) successfully attacks a Confederate company led by James Langdon (Rock Hudson). With the remnants of Langdon's squadron fleeing to Mexico, Thomas and his adopted Native American son, Blue Boy (Roman Gabriel), gather a herd of horses and head for the border with their company, to sell them. After Langdon's caravan is captured by a Mexican general (Tony Aguilar), Thomas nobly sacrifices the horses to free them.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt thinks a man accused of murder is being framed, despite an apparent eyewitness account.

programme.title: Rio Lobo
programme.desc: Union leader Cord McNally (John Wayne) is protecting a routine gold shipment when his troops are attacked by Confederate forces. Not only does he lose the gold, but one of his strongest officers is killed in the raid. At the end of the Civil War, McNally learns that the raiders had help from the inside, and he vows to uncover the two traitors. After a chance encounter with one of the turncoats, McNally travels to the town of Rio Lobo and makes an unexpected discovery.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright is the patriarch of an all-male Nevada ranching family. Set during and after the Civil War, "Bonanza" is the story of life on the family's thousand-acre spread, known as the Ponderosa, near Virginia City. Ben has his three sons, each with a different (and deceased) mother. Serious eldest son Adam hopes to follow in his father's footsteps; middle son Hoss is a gentle giant -- physically strong, but sometimes naive; and youngest son Little Joe is the most impetuous and romantic of the offspring.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E9 The Trials of Temple Houston Temple Houston, flamboyant son of Sam Houston, works hard to live up to his famous name as a top attorney in the Oklahoma Territory. But his flair for showmanship annoys his courtroom rivals, the Jennings brothers, and the feud erupts into bloodshed.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E12 Annie Oakley & Buffalo Bill's Wild West Showdown When Buffalo Bill adds female sharpshooter Lillian Smith to his Wild West show, it jeopardizes his relationship with the show's current star, Annie Oakley. As the rivalry between Annie and Lillian escalates, the future of the show is put at risk.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E3 Jim Baker: A Born Leader Heading west as a young adventurer, greenhorn Jim Baker quickly develops a reputation as a skilled marksman and mountain man. When a party of trappers is surrounded and attacked by Cheyenne and Arapaho warriors, Baker proves that he is also a leader.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E8 A Bull’s Market It's now down to the top five cowboys. In the last immunity challenge of the season, Trace tests the competitors' cattle IQ with a trivia challenge — the cowboy way. For every true or false question, the cowboys must rope a steer wearing a sign with the correct answer to earn a point, and the cowboy with the most points wins. One cowboy's strategy to hang back and let the other contestants take themselves out backfires. In the elimination challenge, Trace gets rid of the teams! It may be every cowboy for themself, but they still have to work together to separate two bulls from a herd of cattle. The cowboys debate over how to get the job done, but they eventually reach an agreement. When their plan quickly goes south and puts them all in danger, two cowboys lock horns, and the arena heats up during elimination. The judges make a major revelation about the challenge, and the cowboy with a bossy attitude gets the boot.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E13 Spies The Kid befriends a young woman named Margaret, who unbeknownst to him, is a charming spy. His kindness toward her results in him and the other riders becoming involved in an elaborate scheme to steal a gold shipment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E17 Long Trek While escorting a killer named Stanley to North Fork to stand trial, Lucas and Marshal Micah Torrance endure harsh conditions crossing the desert. Micah is injured and their horses are lost. The prisoner taunts them but Lucas' endurance prevails.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E18 The Actress A dying friend of Lucas McCain's asks him to go to a nearby town to bring back his wife, Elizabeth, so he can see her one last time. Lucas agrees but is surprised to find a beautiful, young actress who is not interested in grieving over her husband.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E19 Face of Yesterday Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when he comes face-to-face with Simon Lee, a young man who looks exactly like a Confederate officer he killed during the Civil War. Simon Lee is fast with a gun, and provokes Lucas into a life and death situation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E22 Closer Than a Brother Marshal Micah Torrance loses his confidence in his job of authority and begins drinking again after an old enemy from the past terrorizes him. When Lucas learns of the situation, he invites the man to North Fork and convinces Micah to face his fears.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Argonauts Cheyenne tries to help two prospectors locate a gold mine after Indians kill their partner, who knew the mine's location. Cheyenne finds the gold, but greed and distrust take over the prospectors, causing major issues.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E4 Border Showdown Cheyenne and Smitty travel to Mexico to bring a gang of outlaws accused of killing Cheyenne's close friend to justice. However, after they arrive, they discover that the small Mexican town is under the rule of the gang's leader.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S4 E2 New Sheriff in Town It’s back to basics on The Cowboy Way as the guys work to rotate cattle off a lightning-struck field to fresh grass, but the routine wrangle suddenly heads south as the herd scatters, jumping and taking down part of a fence. Kaley wonders about finances and if she should find work, while Bubba invests in a starter herd for daughter Andie’s Cowgirl College Fund. Jaclyn rushes to prepare for Matthew’s 4th birthday party and anxiously waits for news after a job interview. Booger’s parents have a special birthday surprise for Matthew. As the Cattlemen’s Association Ambassador, Cody gets a call from a local farmer and meets their autistic son Tristan. Misty gives Cody an idea how to share the cowboy way lifestyle with this special boy.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: These guys can wrangle any bull, but can they tame a wild bulldozer? In this episode of The Cowboy Way, the guys decide to build a new barn for a local rancher but it’s man versus machine when Bubba’s dozer breaks a pipeline, releasing a torrent of water. Jaclyn admits to her boss she’s been looking for a job closer to home, then worries it might get her fired altogether. Will her family have to survive on one income? Cody decides to write a book about the cowboy way of life, but he may have bitten off more than he can chew. The cowboys struggle to get the barn raised in time to process the first shipment of the herd and might have to call in some favors to do it.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E29 The Score Is Even Lucas and Mark go on a hunting trip and soon become witnesses to a robbery and murder. Lucas subdues the two robbers, but is severely wounded in the process. Lucas struggles to get the robbers to justice, but devises a plan just in the nick of time.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E30 The Mescalero Curse Lucas serves as a jury foreman when a Mescalero Apache Indian is found guilty of murder and is hanged. A Mescalero medicine man places a curse on Lucas. At first Lucas brushes it off, then unusual events begin to happen including a ghost stallion.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E1 They Killed Me Frontiersman Jim Bridger spins an incredible tale to a group of settlers, claiming he was once killed by Blackfeet warriors yet somehow lived to tell the tale. They think he's joking, but Bridger soon proves that he really did rise from the dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E4 Brothers in Arms When they are ambushed by a Blackfeet war party, Jim Bridger and a lone Shoshone brave must work together to find a way to defeat their common enemy. If they can't overcome their suspicions and learn to trust each other, they may not survive the day.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles

programme.title: Cheyenne

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S4 E4 Keep on Chuckin' It’s The Cowboy Way’s first road trip ever! Bubba, Cody and Booger cut loose and head north to enter a big chuck wagon race. But they quickly discover this race is not for amateurs. Loose wagon wheels, knee-deep mud and professional-grade competition raise both the stakes, and their concerns. Will the guys risk life and limb to race and win? And while the cowboys are away, a surprise shipment of cattle comes in days early and their wives must jump into action. But this drop off is anything but routine when Kaley and Misty discover one heifer has an infection that could threaten the entire herd.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: Booger goes back to school! On this episode of The Cowboy Way, the cowboys visit the Montgomery Stockyard to research cattle prices and Booger gets bitten by the auctioneering bug. Will his auctioneering classes pay off? Back at the ranch, the guys catch heat from a neighbor when their herd escapes into his field, and a rebellious heifer takes them on one heck of a ride. Misty’s brother-in-law, Chip, stops by and gives Cody an earful that his feeding pasture has turned to dirt. And when the cattle stock market takes a nosedive, the cowboys’ million-dollar business partner calls the gang into his office for a tough talk.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E31 Stopover A brutal snowstorm makes the roads impassable and forces a stagecoach to stop at the McCain Ranch. Lucas gives the passengers shelter, but little does he know a dance hall girl, a drunk, and a famous gunslinger are his guests.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E32 The Lonesome Bride Brothers Charv and Kelly Banner play a joke on Lucas that soon gets out of hand when they contact a St. Louis marriage bureau to send a possible bride for Lucas. Mary Woodson arrives in North Fork ready for marriage, but Lucas wants no part of it.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Fossil Feud When bloodthirsty Canadian trappers try to kill him, mountain man Jim Bridger takes cover in an unexplored valley. There, he runs headlong into a family of escaped slaves who show him the huge footprints and fossilized bones of long-dead monsters.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E1 Bat Masterson Leaves the West After leaving Dodge City, Bat Masterson takes a job as manager of Denver's Palace Theatre. There he falls in love with Emma Walter, a jugging virtuoso known as the Queen of Clubs, and begins to question his life as a gunslinger.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E6 Black Bart's Revenge Wells Fargo detective James Hume hires private investigator Harry Morse to join the hunt for Black Bart. Known as the Poet Highwayman, Bart leaves tantalizing poems at the scenes of his crimes, which may be the key to unmasking Bart's true identity.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E4 Lucien Maxwell: Legend of New Mexico Having explored the frontier with his good friend Kit Carson, Lucien Maxwell is eager to settle down with his family. But before he can establish a ranching empire in New Mexico, Maxwell must first survive a deadly clash with the Jicarilla Apache.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E9 Every Cowboy for Themselves The competition takes a new turn now that it’s down to the top four cowboys. This time around, there’s no immunity challenge, and teams are a thing of the past. Every cowboy stands on their own, and one wrong move could cost them the competition. The cowboys have two shots at making it to the final three with a two-part elimination challenge. In Part One, the first cowboy to rope, drive and load two steers and their horse in a trailer wins. Two cowboys are neck and neck the entire round, but only one comes up on top. Part two’s obstacle course tests the contestants’ control and handling of the unruly colts they’ve been training since early on in the competition. But just when the finish line is in view, Trace throws a curveball into the competition that catches the cowboys off guard. While some thrive under the pressure, ultimately, the cowboy that can’t adapt in the moment goes home.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E14 Shadowmen A Pinkerton agent comes to Rock Creek in search of a bank robber. Meanwhile, Teaspoon befriends Marie, who claims to be destitute, but Bill and Jesse discover that she is part of an outlaw gang.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E20 The Wyoming Story Part 1 After Lucas' herd is wiped out by disease, he takes a job as an undercover agent for the U.S. government to raise money for new cattle. He travels to Wyoming to learn how renegade Cheyenne Indians are getting rifles illegally.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E21 The Wyoming Story Part 2 Lucas continues his investigation in Wyoming and makes contact with the local Indian agent, the source of the illegal gun-running operation. However, Lucas' life is put in danger when the town drunk reveals his true identity.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E23 The Lost Treasure of Canyon Town On the way home to North Fork, Lucas, Micah, and Mark take a detour to Micah's hometown. A thriving mining town years ago, it is now a ghost town except for Mr. Newman and his son who still live there. Something is amiss, and a mystery is revealed.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E24 Dark Day at North Fork While hauling dynamite, Lucas accidentally creates a spark, leading to an explosion. He is blinded and Doc Burrage isn't sure if he will regain his sight. When an enemy from Lucas' past shows up in town, he is in danger, as the man aims to kill him.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Outlander Cheyenne's travels take him to a small town called Paradise Springs. Instead of a warm welcome, angry townspeople confront him and quickly run him out of town. However, perplexed by his cruel treatment, he returns to uncover the reason behind it.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E6 The Travelers The murder of a US Marshal forces Cheyenne to bring back the outlaw wanted for the crime. However, Cheyenne doesn't believe the man is guilty. On his way back with the fugitive, the father of the victim is hot on his trail.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S4 E4 Keep on Chuckin' It’s The Cowboy Way’s first road trip ever! Bubba, Cody and Booger cut loose and head north to enter a big chuck wagon race. But they quickly discover this race is not for amateurs. Loose wagon wheels, knee-deep mud and professional-grade competition raise both the stakes, and their concerns. Will the guys risk life and limb to race and win? And while the cowboys are away, a surprise shipment of cattle comes in days early and their wives must jump into action. But this drop off is anything but routine when Kaley and Misty discover one heifer has an infection that could threaten the entire herd.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: Booger goes back to school! On this episode of The Cowboy Way, the cowboys visit the Montgomery Stockyard to research cattle prices and Booger gets bitten by the auctioneering bug. Will his auctioneering classes pay off? Back at the ranch, the guys catch heat from a neighbor when their herd escapes into his field, and a rebellious heifer takes them on one heck of a ride. Misty’s brother-in-law, Chip, stops by and gives Cody an earful that his feeding pasture has turned to dirt. And when the cattle stock market takes a nosedive, the cowboys’ million-dollar business partner calls the gang into his office for a tough talk.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E31 Stopover A brutal snowstorm makes the roads impassable and forces a stagecoach to stop at the McCain Ranch. Lucas gives the passengers shelter, but little does he know a dance hall girl, a drunk, and a famous gunslinger are his guests.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E32 The Lonesome Bride Brothers Charv and Kelly Banner play a joke on Lucas that soon gets out of hand when they contact a St. Louis marriage bureau to send a possible bride for Lucas. Mary Woodson arrives in North Fork ready for marriage, but Lucas wants no part of it.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Fossil Feud When bloodthirsty Canadian trappers try to kill him, mountain man Jim Bridger takes cover in an unexplored valley. There, he runs headlong into a family of escaped slaves who show him the huge footprints and fossilized bones of long-dead monsters.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E1 Bat Masterson Leaves the West After leaving Dodge City, Bat Masterson takes a job as manager of Denver's Palace Theatre. There he falls in love with Emma Walter, a jugging virtuoso known as the Queen of Clubs, and begins to question his life as a gunslinger.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E6 Black Bart's Revenge Wells Fargo detective James Hume hires private investigator Harry Morse to join the hunt for Black Bart. Known as the Poet Highwayman, Bart leaves tantalizing poems at the scenes of his crimes, which may be the key to unmasking Bart's true identity.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E4 Lucien Maxwell: Legend of New Mexico Having explored the frontier with his good friend Kit Carson, Lucien Maxwell is eager to settle down with his family. But before he can establish a ranching empire in New Mexico, Maxwell must first survive a deadly clash with the Jicarilla Apache.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E9 Every Cowboy for Themselves The competition takes a new turn now that it’s down to the top four cowboys. While some thrive under the pressure, ultimately, the cowboy that can’t adapt in the moment goes home.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E6 The Travelers The murder of a US Marshal forces Cheyenne to bring back the outlaw wanted for the crime. However, Cheyenne doesn't believe the man is guilty. On his way back with the fugitive, the father of the victim is hot on his trail.

programme.title: Romance in the Wilds
programme.desc: Deep in the Rocky Mountains, lightning strikes a mining site, sparking a deadly wildfire and igniting an unexpected romance between a forest ranger and a geologist as they race to escape the flames.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E33 Death Trap Lucas and Mark find a wounded man and bring him into North Fork to save his life. Lucas asks Simon Battle, a gunfighter-turned-doctor, to help the man. The wounded man's enemies have other plans in store.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E34 The Queue A Chinese man named Wang Chi and his son, Wang Lee, come to North Fork to open a laundry service in town. Vince Fergus, a prejudiced man, bullies them but Micah, Lucas, and Milly try to convince them to stay. A fight between Fergus and Lucas ensues.

programme.title: Freedom on the Range
programme.desc: S1 E1 From brave lawmen to rugged cowboys, discover the untold stories of African Americans' cultural significance in the Old West.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E7 Elijah Briant and the Wild Bunch When Elijah Briant is elected sheriff, the mild-mannered druggist and former teacher tries to enforce the law without carrying a weapon. But he soon faces his greatest challenge when the last surviving members of the Wild Bunch descend on his town.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E8 El Bandito Vasquez When an elusive bandito terrorizes early Los Angeles County, an eager reporter shadows the sheriff who is hunting the dangerous outlaw. Will the reporter stay objective or take matters into his own hands when he comes face to face with the killer?

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E5 Bill Hamilton: The Last Mountain Man Coming of age on the frontier, young Bill Hamilton joins Old Bill Williams on an epic adventure during the final days of the fur trade. The last true mountain man, Hamilton's courage is tested when he faces an epic showdown with Bannock warriors.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E10 Last Hand Standing In the season finale of Ultimate Cowboy Showdown, the top three competitors cowboy up for a chance to win it all. In the last elimination challenge, the cowboys must work as a team to separate the prized cattle from two hundred other cows and drive the herd to a semi-truck, where they will load them up for the winner to take home. A big job for three cowboys, frustrations get the best of them. One contestant covers the rougher country to stand out to the judges. Another cowboy suggests breaking the rules to finish the job, but their teammate steps up and takes the lead to get the job done right. Trace sits down with each cowboy to talk about what winning would mean to them before announcing the Ultimate Cowboy Showdown winner.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E15 Mask of Fear After serving his time in prison, a murderer returns to Rock Creek. Meanwhile, Jesse has a new boss in Fury, who he looks up to as a father figure. But, the murder of his boss leads Jesse and the townspeople quick to blame the town's new arrival.

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman
programme.desc: When a gunslinger with a bad disposition is nursed back to health and desired by a Quaker girl, he finds himself having to choose between his lawless life or the peaceful world of his newfound love.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E18 Sporting Chance Englishman Jeremy Pennebroke arrives in North Fork and announces he has come to kill Lucas McCain with his custom-made rifle. He believes if he guns Lucas down, he will earn respect and a reputation. Ironically, Lucas later defends Pennebroke.

programme.title: Romance in the Wilds
programme.desc: Deep in the Rocky Mountains, lightning strikes a mining site, sparking a deadly wildfire and igniting an unexpected romance between a forest ranger and a geologist as they race to escape the flames.

programme.desc: S3 E15 Mask of Fear After serving his time in prison, a murderer returns to Rock Creek. Meanwhile, Jesse has a new boss in Fury, who he looks up to as a father figure. But, the murder of his boss leads Jesse and the townspeople quick to blame the town's new arrival.

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman
programme.desc: When a gunslinger with a bad disposition is nursed back to health and desired by a Quaker girl, he finds himself having to choose between his lawless life or the peaceful world of his newfound love.

programme.title: The Warrant: Breaker's Law
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal John Breaker and his deputy ride to a town held hostage by a ruthless gang as they transport a prisoner through the West. With the fate of a community at stake, they must decide if they will abandon the town or make a stand for justice.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E9 The Long Goodbye Stubborn Grandpa Fogerty lives in a rundown house with his grandson, Woody. Lucas tries to get the old man to send the boy to school. The ladies of North Fork want Woody removed from the home and ask Lucas to help them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E10 The Shattered Idol Famous writer Mark Twain visits North Fork and Mark, who idolizes him, is hurt by his rudeness. Lucas intervenes and discovers the source of Twain's bitterness comes from personal tragedy. Later, both Marks become friends.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E11 Long Gun from Tucson A killer, John Holliver, and his followers come to North Fork looking for revenge. All of the residents are terrified since they ran him out of town five years earlier. Lucas, now acting marshal, realizes that he must face Holliver and his men alone.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E12 The High Country Two mountain men, Ambrose and Gorwin, come to the McCain Ranch. Ambrose is captivated by Lucas' rifle but Lucas won't trade it. After Gorwin is killed trying to steal it, the family holds Lucas accountable.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E5 James Harrod: Kentucky's Founding Father When frontiersman James Harrod founds Harrod's Town on Native American hunting grounds in Kentucky, he soon finds his new settlement under attack. His leadership is tested as he defends the first European settlement west of the Appalachian Mountains.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E14 Annie Oakley: Rise of a Shooting Star After her father’s death, nine-year-old Annie Oakley first picks up a rifle and begins shooting small game in order to feed her siblings and support her widowed mother. By her teenage years, Annie is so good at hunting that she begins supplying meat to a local grocery store, earning enough money to pay off her mother’s mortgage. When famed sharpshooter Frank Butler comes to town for an exhibition, Annie accepts his challenge to participate in a shooting match. Not only does she win the match, but she wins Butler’s heart as well. They are soon married, but they struggle to make it as a team on stage. A better shooter, Annie must become the main attraction for them to succeed. Years later, legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson, tracks down Annie’s husband to learn more about the rise of this shooting star.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E15 Charles M. Russell: The Cowboy Artist Charlie Russell is an aimless cowhand who loves the freedom of the cowboy way of life, and he is a self-taught artist who enjoys capturing the scenes of his rugged work on the range. Too embarrassed to ask people to pay for his paintings, he gives most of them away to friends or trades them for drinks at the saloon. But that changes quickly after he falls in love. Charlie’s new bride Nancy gives him the encouragement he needs to stop cowboying in order to focus on his artwork. Under her watchful eye, he sobers up, stops cowboying, and improves his mastery of painting. Nancy is so proud of Charlie’s talent that she doesn’t hesitate to ask top dollar for his paintings. Years later, when legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson tries to do a piece on Charlie, he quickly realizes that he must first deal with the woman behind the famous cowboy artist Charles M. Russell.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S5 E4 Two Trails to Santa Fe Cheyenne helps an Apache woman escape torture from her tribe. He transports her to Santa Fe. However, angry Apaches retaliate and attack a settlement. The pair also encounters gold-hungry prospectors along the way.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E9 The Spiked Rifle Lucas agrees to ride shotgun on a stagecoach carrying $20,000 in gold for North Fork banker John Hamilton after a man fails to show up. When three men rob the stage and take Mark hostage, Lucas must get both the gold and Mark back safely.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E10 Letter of the Law Marshal Micah Torrance arrests infamous outlaw Brett Stocker and deputizes Lucas McCain into duty so he can transport the outlaw to another town. When Stocker's gang ambush Torrance and send a letter to Lucas with demands, Lucas must act quickly.

programme.title: The Last Days of Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: When the famous James brothers give up robbing banks and attempt to live as reputable gentleman farmers, they are soon forced to seek revenge on the men who bomb their mother's house, crippling her, and killing their stepbrother.

programme.title: Concrete Cowboys
programme.desc: When two lively cowboys from Montana are set up by a crooked sheriff, they wind up on the run. After arriving in Nashville, the two open a detective agency together and are soon hired to prevent the kidnapping of a country singer.

programme.title: The Warrant: Breaker's Law
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal John Breaker and his deputy ride to a town held hostage by a ruthless gang as they transport a prisoner through the West. With the fate of a community at stake, they must decide if they will abandon the town or make a stand for justice.

Russell.
